title: Luigi Piangerelli
text:
Luigi Piangerelli (born 19 October 1973 in <a href="Porto%20Recanati">Porto Recanati</a>) is an Italian former <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> player.
He was a key player for <a href="A.C.%20Cesena">A.C. Cesena</a> at <a href="Serie%20B">Serie B</a>. After Cesena relegated, he joined <a href="U.S.%20Lecce">Lecce</a>, which newly promoted to Serie A.
In January 2004, he was signed by <a href="ACF%20Fiorentina">Fiorentina</a> and returned to Cesena in 2009.
